1 kalastatic KalaStatic

KalaStatic is a static site framework for prototyping and building out websites.

Its primary purpose is to put into practice atomic web design principles to produce a living styleguide that can be used to guide back-end implementations in a framework agnostic approach. As such, it serves as a point of convergence between front-end development, back-end development, and content strategy.
